Title: Authorizes the issuance of "Blue Star Mother" and "Blue Star Family" distinctive license plates and establishes the "blue star mothers and families fund"
Summary: Authorizes the issuance of "Blue Star Mother" and "Blue Star Family" distinctive license plates for parents and family members of active duty service members; establishes the "blue star mothers and families support fund".
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง95-l, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the issuance of "Blue Star Mother" and "Blue Star Family" distinctive license plates; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "blue star mothers and families support fund"
